lead_paragraph: McCOURT--Alphie, a man of quiet strength, deeply devoted to his wife Lynn and daughter Allison, was suddenly taken from us July 2. His wit and charm expressed in song and written word will live in our hearts forever. Sandy Geis, Adele Richter Dianna & Lenny De Martino The Sarro & Gupta families 1/3
